Mediterranean and Greek Islands | Cunard | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Mediterranean and Greek Islands 14 Nights | Barcelona Roundtrip Bonus Receive up to US$480* onboard credit per Oceanview Stateroom or US$530* onboard credit per Balcony Stateroom Deal Details Travel Dates 4 May 26 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $3,801 per person Enquire Now Bonus Receive up to US$480* onboard credit per Oceanview Stateroom or US$530* onboard credit per Balcony Stateroom Step aboard the elegant Queen Victoria for this roundtrip Mediterranean voyage, beginning and ending in the vibrant city of Barcelona. This unforgettable journey offers a rich tapestry of experiences as you sail through the sun-kissed coastlines and storied islands of the Mediterranean. Uncover the wonders of ancient cities and UNESCO World Heritage Sites, from majestic cathedrals and Roman ruins to cobbled old towns steeped in history. Wander through sleepy seaside villages, bask in hidden coves, and soak up the timeless beauty of the region. Pricing Oceanview Stateroom (Cat EB) From $3,801* per person, twin share Receive US$480 Onboard Credit per stateroom! Balcony Stateroom (Cat BE) From $4,470* per person, twin share (pictured) Receive US$530 Onboard credit per stateroom! What's Included 14 Night Cruise Barcelona Return on Queen Victoria All main meals and entertainment onboard Daily traditional Afternoon Tea in the Queens Room Onboard activities including the Insights Programme, live music and theatre, group gym classes, deck games and more Gala Evenings All port charges Itinerary Ports and their order are subject to change at the discretion of the cruise line. Day 1 Depart Barcelona, Spain Day 2 At Sea Day 3 At Sea Day 4 Heraklion, Greece Day 5 Kusadasi (Ephesus), Turkey Day 6 Dardanelles Strait, Turkey (Transit) Day 7 Istanbul, Turkey Day 8 Istanbul, Turkey Day 9 Dardanelles Strait, Turkey (Transit) Day 10 Piraeus (Athens), Greece Day 11 Mykonos, Greece Day 12 Katakolon, Greece Day 13 Messina Strait, Italy Day 14 At Sea Day 15 Arrive Barcelona, Spain Your Ship Queen Victoria offers a uniquely refined cruise experience, where timeless elegance blends effortlessly with exceptional service. On board, you'll discover a remarkable way to explore the world in comfort and style. From the moment you embark, you're welcomed into a world of relaxation and discovery. Spend your days basking in the sunshine or enjoying peaceful ocean views from the airy and serene Winter Garden. Enrich your journey with thought-provoking talks from Cunard Insights guest speakers, or unwind with a favorite book in a quiet corner of the ship. As evening arrives, indulge in a range of exquisite dining experiences and enjoy captivating performances at the Royal Court Theatre. Whether you're seeking enrichment, relaxation, or a touch of glamour, Queen Victoria offers the freedom to shape your voyage exactly as you wish. Terms & Conditions T&Cs: Pricing is correct as of 04 November 25. From price is per person twin share valid for sale until 30 November 2025, unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. Gratuities of US$14.50-16.50 per person per day are additional and payable direct onboard. Airfares & transfers are additional. Experience the world differently.
